definitions.definition: That which is absurd ; an absurd action; a logical contradiction .
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the late 15 century.

definitions.definition: The quality of being absurd or inconsistent with obvious truth, reason, or sound judgment.
definitions.dating_raw: First attested in the early 16 century.
Attested from around 1350 to 1470 until the late 17 century.

main_definition: ( countable ) That which is absurd ; an absurd action; a logical contradiction . [First attested in the late 15 century.]
secondary_definitions: ( uncountable ) The quality of being absurd or inconsistent with obvious truth, reason, or sound judgment. [First attested in the early 16 century.]
( obsolete , rare ) Dissonance . [Attested from around 1350 to 1470 until the late 17 century.]
